## Leaflet Interactive Map
Create a leaflet map object.
```{r }
library(leaflet)
map <- leaflet() %>% addTiles()

```

Creating a map for Mont Royal in Montreal and add a picutre from Wikipedia.
```{r}
benrathPalaceIcon <- makeIcon(
   iconUrl = "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Mtroyal.jpg",
   iconWidth = 30*408/255, iconHeight = 30,
   iconAnchorX = 30*408/255/2, iconAnchorY = 30/2
)
```

Add the marker to the map and display the map.
```{r}
montRoyalMarker <- c("<a href= 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mount_Royal' >Mont Royal<br><img src='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mount_Royal#/media/File:Mtroyal.jpg' width='210' height='132' title='Mont Royal'></a>")
map %>%
   addTiles() %>%
   addMarkers(lat=45.506389, lng=-73.588889, popup = montRoyalMarker)
```
